tagline: Three hundred tasks in a trenchcoat, managed with timelines and color-coded checklists
pros: Comprehensive reverse-timeline planning from move date
Systematic address change tracking that catches everything
Handles complex moves: international, pets, special items
First-48-hours planning ensures sanity on arrival
cons: Can't help with real estate decisions or mortgage planning
High organizational overhead may feel excessive for simple moves

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
